The cheaper workshop will charge me additional $60 for balancing so honestly  the difference is only $40. And I still get free rotation  balancing  patching up & nitrogen fill with PT.

Only downside is with patching up  I need to drive down to their workshop to enjoy the free services so if SGCM could tackle this  users can enjoy convenience no matter where they are on the island.
